statements: SELECT * FROM payment_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, payer_name, amount, transaction_date, payment_method FROM payment_transactions;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, payer_name, amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT transaction_id, payer_name, payment_method FROM payment_transactions WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, amount ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT payer_name, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM payment_transactions GROUP BY payer_name ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND payment_method = 'Credit Card' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT payer_name, payment_method, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM payment_transactions GROUP BY payer_name, payment_method
SELECT DISTINCT payer_name FROM payment_transactions
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, date FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = '1234';
SELECT invoice_id, amount, status FROM invoices ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS invoice_count FROM invoices GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT invoice_id, amount, status FROM invoices WHERE status = 'PAID' ORDER BY due_date;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS highest_amount, MIN(amount) AS lowest_amount FROM transactions;
SELECT invoice_id, amount, status FROM invoices WHERE status = 'PENDING' AND amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY amount;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_spent FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, payment_method FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT invoice_number, total_amount FROM invoices WHERE total_amount < 500;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT invoice_number, total_amount FROM invoices WHERE total_amount < 500 ORDER BY total_amount ASC
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%'
SELECT invoice_number, invoice_date FROM invoices WHERE invoice_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30'
SELECT * FROM transactions INNER JOIN customers ON transactions.transaction_id = customers.customer_id
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT customer_id, amount FROM transactions;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT invoice_date, total_amount FROM invoices WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount_paid FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT invoice_id, total_amount FROM invoices WHERE total_amount < 5000 AND invoice_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE method = 'Credit Card' OR method = 'PayPal' ORDER BY payment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.date, t.amount, c.customer_name FROM transactions t JOIN customers c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE t.amount >= 500 ORDER BY t.amount DESC, c.customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, description FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50.00;
SELECT invoice_id, invoice_date, total_amount FROM invoices WHERE total_amount < 1000.00 ORDER BY invoice_date;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT invoice_id, total_amount, client_name FROM invoices JOIN clients ON invoices.client_id = clients.client_id WHERE invoice_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT invoice_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM invoice_items GROUP BY invoice_id HAVING total_quantity > 10;
SELECT client_name, contact_email FROM clients WHERE contact_email IS NOT NULL ORDER BY client_name;
